version_description:
- Now you can verify your account to let others know you're real
- Fixed some UI issues
- Now also edit your profile by tapping your name on your profile
- Fixed WeChat login failed

- Fixed signing up from Facebook and WeChat

- Your search filters are now saved. No need to redo them anymore
- Tap the overflow menu in profiles to hide people from search results

- Added ability to change your name & birthday once every 3 months

- Contacted by someone who says they're from 2RedBeans but not sure if they're lying? Staff members now have labels next to their names.
- For some who haven't filled out the city they're in, we'll ask you to fill one in.
